alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 3:36AM CDT until April 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF THE OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham... Potter...Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall... Armstrong...Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...6 to 9. * Timing...Through midnight.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
